price: 25. Ningisa nzete ya nagh’la(1), benda yango epai nayo ekokweisela yo mbuma na yango ya kotela.
arabic: وَهُزِّيٓ إِلَيۡكِ بِجِذۡعِ ٱلنَّخۡلَةِ تُسَٰقِطۡ عَلَيۡكِ رُطَبٗا جَنِيّٗا
footnotes: 1 Nagh’la: Bótala suratu Al-An’âm: 99, suratu Al-Kahf: 32.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wahuzzī ilayki bijidh'ʿi al-nakhlati tusāqiṭ ʿalayki ruṭaban janiyyan
